backend/main.mo: Defines audit logging, user profiles, access control, and initialization logic for the backend canister with security role enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Lists product features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of frontend source files for reference or documentation generation.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, role checks, profile setup, and rendering the admin dashboard or access denial.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied message with login or informational text depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Renders a detailed modal view of an audit log entry with metadata, action descriptions, and severity formatting.
Displays user authentication status, principal ID, and backend connection health with options to copy the principal and retry connectivity.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Provides a UI to view and update external broadcasting settings, including enabling the feature and configuring an endpoint URL.
Implements a file-based code editor with category switching, unsaved change detection, content editing, and applying or resetting file changes.
Shows deployment instructions and a link for deploying the application via the Caffeine platform, with explanatory alerts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with authentication controls, user role badges, and a theme toggle using Internet Identity and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network, connection status, and canister ID using health checks and shows errors with retry controls.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Provides UI for selecting network and updating canister ID with validation, success messages, and reset-to-defaults logic.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: Static informational panel explaining prerequisites and steps for deploying canisters to the ICP mainnet.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for a name and saving the profile via a mutation with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Shows recent security alerts and flagged users in real time, filtering logs from the last five minutes.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Implements an interactive terminal UI that executes registered commands, maintains history, and records audit entries.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Computes recent security event statistics from audit logs and displays alerts and summarized metrics in a UI card layout.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Provides tools for superusers to export audit logs, record export events, and download flagged user data.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: UI panel for creating and submitting test audit log entries with customizable fields and event types.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Allows admins to flag, unflag, and remove users, showing a table of flagged principals with related actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs a lightweight backend call to verify connectivity and reports connection status with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: Manages network and canister ID configuration with URL/session overrides and validation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, app controller status, audit logs, and related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard UI with audit log filtering, status panels, and various management components.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Maintains a registry of terminal commands, including lookup, aliasing, and category grouping.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Defines built‑in terminal commands such as help, clear, and security role management with backend‑linked actions and auditing.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Provides helpers for audit logging, error classification, authentication/connection checks, timestamp formatting, and mapping strings to backend enum types.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for terminal commands, context, outputs, and history entries.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages code editor file states in localStorage, including loading, saving, applying changes, and detecting unsaved edits.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Handles ICP network config defaults, canister ID validation, and utilities for network labels and host URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, goals, planned architecture, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
